paragraphs: I am 27 years old and i reside in Salt Lake City, Utah. I am married to my beautiful Wife, Hannah! I love sports and cars

I have recently completed formal training at Univerity of Utah as Full Stack Web Developer. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, Express, MySQL, MongoDB, and React. I am also experienced in developing with APIs, and have a strong understanding of the MERN stack.
